Topic.Title: How do I use my save after I die?

Posts.EditableText: I press save, then die, the dont know how to load my save?
Posts.HTML: I press save, then die, the dont know how to load my save?

Posts.EditableText: You need to go back to the game's web page that you launched the game from. You may need to refresh it, but you should see two buttons, "Restart" and "Play (resume)". The latter will load your saved game.
Posts.HTML: You need to go back to the game's web page that you launched the game from. You may need to refresh it, but you should see two buttons, "Restart" and "Play (resume)". The latter will load your saved game.
